description:
4 Panel Mosaic of a LOT of galaxies in and around Markarian's Chain. Doing a plate solve in PixInsight it found 2021 PGC galaxies. Here I marked this up showing the 12 Messier objects in the field of view. I will be adding the full size version as a revision. (I had to save it fairly compressed to get the filesize down). It is a little noisy but it was a fun target to shoot.


Software used to capture image:
Sequence Generator Pro
PHD2

Software used to edit:
PixInsight
Photoshop

Total data gathered:
(396) Lum @ 120secs - 1x1
(80) R @ 240secs - 1x1
(77) G @ 240secs - 1x1
(76) B @ 240secs - 1x1

Camera : QHY600 with Readout mode 0 and Gain set to 26 with Offset at 76.
Telescope: Takahashi FSQ-106EDX4
Mount: AP Mach1GTO
title: Galaxies Galore (206 megapixel - 4 Panel Mosaic)
